bug.question: I have wings and like flowers. I make yummy honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I am small and black and march in a line. I like to carry food. What am I?
I have spots and am red. I am good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 People think I bring good fortune.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then sleep in a chrysalis and become a beautiful thing with wings. What am I?
I jump very high and I am green. I love to eat grass. Who am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am the color of grass.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🦵 I have more legs than you.

bug.question: I glow in the dark on summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am most active at night.

bug.question: I make a buzzing noise when I fly. I bite and can be annoying. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be found near water.

bug.question: I chirp at night, hiding in the grass. You can hear me but not see me. What am I?
I like to eat clothes and make holes. I can live in your closet. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You might find me in your home.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and shine in the day! What am I?

hints.text: 🕶️ You need sunglasses when I'm out.

cosmos.question: I am white and round, and you see me at night. Sometimes I'm a circle, sometimes I'm a slice! What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people say I'm made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I am a tiny light, far, far away. I twinkle and shine, night and day! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am made of hot, glowing gas.
🔭 You can see lots of me in the night sky.
🌠 Some of me make up constellations!

cosmos.question: I am big and round and have lots of water and land. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Trees and flowers grow on me.

cosmos.question: I’m red and a planet and get very cold. Some people think people might live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My color is like some candy!
🔥I am named after the God of War

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 You can find me using a star chart.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas, much bigger than Earth. I have a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am made mostly of hydrogen and helium.
🔴 I'm the biggest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a cold and icy object that flies through space. I have a long, bright tail when I get close to the Sun! What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of dust and ice.
✨ My tail always points away from the Sun.
🚀 I travel around the Sun in a very long orbit.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many, many stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have a center that's a super massive black hole.
💫 Our sun is part of me!

cosmos.question: I'm a space traveler that goes beyond earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🚀 People go inside me to visit space.
👩‍🚀 I can orbit Earth or travel to the Moon.
🚀 I need rockets to get to space
